description: Children should obey parents even if unreasonable
notes: All waves. 1=Strongly agree to 4=Strongly disagree. Higher=less traditional

description: Not insist on own opinion if coworkers disagree
notes: All waves. Conformity/harmony over individual opinion

description: Man loses face working under female supervisor
Husband should side with mother-in-law over wife
notes: W1 and W3-W6. Filial piety over spousal loyalty

description: Students should not question teacher authority
Follow own beliefs regardless of others
notes: W2 only. REVERSED - agreement=modern/individualistic. Need reversal

description: Sacrifice individual for group collective interest
Avoid open quarrel to preserve group harmony
Plan for future not just immediate interest
notes: W3-W4 only. Similar to q53 but slightly different wording
